actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to include photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors within the temporary suspension of duty on parts of certain electrostatic copying machines, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to include photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors within the suspension of duty on parts of certain electrostatic copying machines. Extends such suspension through December 31, 1994.

titles.title: A bill to include photoreceptors and assemblies containing photoreceptors within the temporary suspension of duty on parts of certain electrostatic copying machines, and for other purposes.
